description: On-demand tool discovery for all your MCPs and per-subagent MCP controls to preserve context window.

GATEWAY_MCP_CONFIG.description: Path to MCP servers configuration file (default: .mcp.json)

GATEWAY_RULES.description: Path to gateway access control rules file (default: .mcp-gateway-rules.json)

GATEWAY_DEFAULT_AGENT.description: Default agent ID when not provided in tool calls

GATEWAY_DEBUG.description: Enable debug mode and expose diagnostic tools (default: false)
